reviews.review:
This game honestly gets worse with every patch. Instead of listening to what the players say is wrong with the game, they just want to introduce more chapters, no matter how buggy they are. The last half a dozen killers are so boring to verse, yes even The Blight, considering 98% of Blight players run 1 build on him.

The Twins has to be the worst designed character ever. Since the game inception, people have complained about getting tunneled and camped. So BHVR's response was to release a killer that needs to camp and tunnel to be effective. Most games against them end up with you bleeding out on the ground for 4 minutes. I know right, FUN.

Their match making is absolutely horrendous. I've 4k hrs as of now, but at least 2k of those were spent in a lobby, and when I do find a lobby, half my team don't know how to tie their own fucking shoe lace.

I do like the game, there's not many if any games like this. It does have potential, but it needs some actual devs that actually know how to program, and not copy and paste 100 different articles from Stack Overflow.
